text: The Netherlands Antilles competed at the 1964 Summer Olympics in Tokyo, Japan. Four competitors, all men, took part in four events in two sports. ==Fencing== One fencer represented the Netherlands Antilles in 1964. ;Men's sabre * Jan Boutmy ==Weightlifting== ==References== ==External links== *Official Olympic Reports Category:Nations at the 1964 Summer Olympics 1964 Category:1964 in the Netherlands Antilles
title: Netherlands Antilles at the 1964 Summer Olympics
